```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```


```{r load_datasets}

# load instacart
instacart = instacart

# load ny_noaa
ny_noaa = ny_noaa

# extract year and month, keep snowfall
ny_noaa = ny_noaa %>% 
            mutate(year = format(as.Date(date), "%Y"),
                   month = format(as.Date(date), "%m"),
                   day = format(as.Date(date), "%d"),
                   snow = as.numeric(snow)) %>% 
            select(id, year, month, day, snow_mm = snow)

# load rest_inspec
rest_inspec = rest_inspec

# filter out missing data, and convert neighbour to a factor variable
rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(!is.na(score) & !boro == "Missing") %>% 
  mutate(boro = as.factor(boro))

```




Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### boxplot

```{r boxplot}

# check the mean score distribution in each neighbourhood.

rest_inspec %>% 
  rename(Score = score, Neighbourhood = boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~Score, color = ~Neighbourhood, colors = "Set2", type = "box")

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatterplot

```{r scatterplot}

# check the change of mean snowfall in winter in NY (Nov, Dec, Jan) in each year.
ny_noaa %>% 
  filter(month == "November" | month == "December" | month == "January") %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(mean_snow_mm = mean(snow_mm, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  rename(Year = year, Snow = mean_snow_mm) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~Year, y = ~Snow, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines')

```


### Bar chart

```{r barchart}
# check the order time pattern

instacart %>% 
  distinct(order_id, order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  group_by(order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  rename("Hour" = order_hour_of_day) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~Hour, y = ~n, color = ~Hour, type = "bar")

```
